relevant_findings.description: Document about Jose Xavier Cortes Hernandez, involving a Jesuit priest named Father Manuel Perez Alonso
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Father Manuel PEREZ Alonso, Jesuit and contact of CAS, was the source of Field comment not 2.
relevant_findings.significance: Provides context of religious and potential intelligence community connections

relevant_findings.description: Mentions communication between religious figures about actions in Mexico
relevant_findings.direct_quote: PEREZ Alonso has been conferring with Archbishop Miguel Dario Miranda, Primate of Mexico, regarding CORTES Hernandez and possible actions against him.
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests potential diplomatic or internal Mexican discussions about an individual

relevant_findings.description: Document discusses Cuban diplomatic connections and activities
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Jose Xavier CORTES Hernandez who represents himself as a priest told Juan Antonio PORTUONDO Valdes, Cuban Ambassador to Mexico
relevant_findings.significance: Provides insight into Cuban diplomatic communications and potential intelligence activities around the time of the assassination

relevant_findings.description: No direct mention of Oswald, but discusses Cuban diplomatic context
relevant_findings.significance: Provides background on Cuban-Mexican diplomatic relations during the period of interest

relevant_findings.description: Document discusses Cuban-Mexican diplomatic interactions related to political tensions
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Jose Xavier CORTES Hernandez... represents himself as a 'priest' told Jose Antonio PORTUGOIDO VALLOY, Cuban Ambassador to Mexico
relevant_findings.significance: Provides context about Cuban diplomatic communications and potential political tensions around 1960

relevant_findings.description: Mentions Carlos OLIVARES, potential government/church official
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Carlos OLIVARES, Under-secretary of Foreign Affairs
relevant_findings.significance: Minimal direct connection to assassination investigation
